docs.abstract: Cuban and American representatives are expected to meet and for first time discuss and try to settle American property claims from time of Cuban revolution; Cuban government seized $1.9 billion in personal and corporate property after US trade embargo was established and elimination of same embargo will likely be part of any settlement agreement.
